sections.heading: Office
sections.text: of Small Business Advocacy� defined. [Effective through June 30, 2025.]

sections.heading: Creation;
sections.text:
personnel; authority of state agencies to cooperate with and assist Office.

[Effective through June 30, 2025.]

sections.heading: Duties
sections.text:
regarding complaints, assisting small businesses to understand rights and

responsibilities, analyzing and monitoring law and policies and disseminating

information. [Effective through June 30, 2025.]

sections.heading: Request
sections.text:
for assistance by small business: Limitations on action by Office; review of

request; protections for person filing request for assistance or participating

in review and investigation. [Effective through June 30, 2025.]

sections.heading: Request
sections.text:
for assistance by small business: Notification of requester regarding status of

request; compilation of statistical data regarding requests and other

communications. [Effective through June 30, 2025.]

sections.heading: Authority
sections.text:
to establish and maintain education course for small businesses. [Effective

through June 30, 2025.]

sections.heading: Account
Confidentiality
sections.text: of records, files and communications. [Effective through June 30, 2025.]

sections.heading: Adoption
sections.text: of regulations by Lieutenant Governor. [Effective through June 30, 2025.]

sections.heading: Creation;
sections.text:
membership; terms and reappointment of members; vacancies; service without

compensation. [Repealed.]

sections.heading: Election
sections.text:
of Chair and Vice Chair; frequency and location of meetings; quorum.

[Repealed.]

sections.heading: Powers;
sections.text:
annual report to Legislative Commission; acceptance of gifts, grants and

donations; operational support; assistance from public agencies. [Repealed.]
